data.description: Jul 14: Toppin (hip) will not return to Monday's Summer League game against the Rockets, Lauren L. Williams of The Atlanta Journal-Constitution reports.
Jul 3: Johnson has suffered a torn labrum in his left shoulder and will miss the rest of the 2024-25 season, NBA reporter Chris Haynes announced Wednesday.
Jul 15: Williams (rest) won't play in Monday's Summer League game against the Heat, Gary Washburn of The Boston Globe reports.
Jul 3: Tatum will miss the rest of the season after undergoing surgery to repair a torn left Achilles tendon Tuesday, Shams Charania of ESPN reports.
Jul 3: Simons (forearm) was traded from the Trail Blazers to the Celtics on Monday along with two second-round draft picks in exchange for Jrue Holiday, Shams Charania of ESPN reports.
Jul 3: Brown underwent a successful right knee arthroscopic debridement procedure Wednesday, the Celtics announced.
Jul 17: Timme (rest) is listed as out for Wednesday's Summer League game against the Magic, Erik Slater of ClutchPoints.com reports.
Jul 17: Etienne (illness) won't play in Wednesday's Summer League game against the Magic, Erik Slater of ClutchPoints.com reports.

Jul 15: Saraf tallied 11 points (4-13 FG, 0-1 3Pt, 3-4 FT), three rebounds, three assists, two steals and one block over 30 minutes in Tuesday's 97-93 Summer League loss to the Knicks. He will not play in Wednesday's Summer League game against the Magic due to rest, Erik Slater of ClutchPoints.com reports.
Jul 3: Williams intends to sign a two-year, $12 million deal with the Nets, Shams Charania of ESPN reports.
Jul 3: The Nets extended Thomas (hamstring)  a qualifying offer Sunday, Brian Lewis of the New York Post reports.
Jul 3: Sharpe (knee) intends to sign a two-year, $12 million deal to return to the Nets, ESPN's Shams Charania reports.
Jul 3: Nets coach Jordi Fernandez said Wednesday that Clowney (ankle) will miss the remainder of the 2024-25 regular season, C.J. Holmes of the New York Daily News reports.
Jul 15: McNeeley has been ruled out for Monday's Summer League game against Dallas due to right Achilles tendinopathy.
Jul 15: James (hip) has been ruled out for Monday's Summer League game against the Mavericks.
Jul 3: Williams underwent successful surgery Wednesday to repair multiple tears in his right knee, ESPN's Shams Charania reports.
Jul 3: Smith (groin) has been ruled out for Sunday's game against the Celtics.
Jul 3: The Hornets announced Friday that Miller underwent surgery to repair a torn scapholunate ligament in his right wrist and will miss the remainder of the 2024-25 season.
Jul 3: Green underwent surgery Friday to address the instability in his left shoulder and has no timetable for his return, Roderick Boone of The Charlotte Observer reports.
Jul 3: Bridges (hip) has been ruled out for Sunday's game against the Celtics.
Jun 24: The Hornets announced Wednesday that Ball has undergone successful surgeries on his right wrist and right ankle, Roderick Boone of The Charlotte Observer reports.
Jul 17: Essengue (quadriceps) has been ruled out for Wednesday's Summer League game against the Bucks, Will Gottlieb of AllCHGO.com reports.
Jul 3: Dosunmu (shoulder) said Thursday that he is no longer wearing a brace and expects to resume 5-on-5 practice in August, K.C. Johnson of Chicago Sports Networkreports.
Jul 17: Porter (hamstring) has been ruled out for Saturday's Summer League game against the Bucks, Chris Fedor of The Cleveland Plain Dealer reports.
Jul 3: Merrill (neck) intends to sign a four-year, $38 million deal with the Cavaliers, Shams Charania of ESPN reports.
Jul 3: Garland (toe) is likely to miss time to open the 2025-26 season, ESPN's Shams Charania reports.
Jun 28: The Bulls traded Ball (wrist) to the Cavaliers in exchange for Isaac Okoro on Saturday, Shams Charania of ESPN reports.
Jul 15: Lively underwent surgery Tuesday to clean up bone spurs in his right foot, ESPN's Shams Charania reports.
Jul 8: Davis underwent a procedure to repair a detached retina that he suffered during the 2024-25 regular season Tuesday, Shams Charania of ESPN reports.
Jul 3: Prosper has been ruled out for the remainder of the 2024-25 season after undergoing surgery to repair a right wrist injury.
Jul 3: Irving (knee) is declining his $43 million player option and intends to sign a three-year, $119 million deal with the Mavericks, source reports.
Jul 3: Stewart (knee) didn't play in the Pistons' final five games of their first-round playoff matchup with the Knicks.
Jul 3: Ivey (lower leg) didn't play in the Pistons' final 55 games of the 2024-25 season, including the playoffs.
Jul 3: Podziemski (wrist) underwent surgery Tuesday to repair a core muscle injury, Dalton Johnson of NBC Sports Bay Area reports.
Jul 3: The Warriors announced Thursday that Moody had surgery on a torn UCL in his right thumb Wednesday, Anthony Slater of The Athletic reports.
Jul 3: The Warriors announced Wednesday that Curry (hamstring) has been cleared for light on-court workouts and will be re-evaluated again Saturday.
Jul 15: Harris (ankle) won't play in Monday's Summer League game against the Hawks, Danielle Lerner of the Houston Chronicle reports.
Jul 15: Dante (ankle) will not return to Monday's Summer League contest against the Hawks, Danielle Lerner of the Houston Chronicle reports.
Jul 3: Finney-Smith (ankle) signed a four-year, $53 million contract with the Rockets on Monday, Shams Charania of ESPN reports.
Jul 3: The Rockets have acquired Durant in a trade with the Suns, Shams Charania of ESPN reports.
Jul 15: Jackson is out for Monday's Summer League game against the Bulls due to left leg soreness, Tony East of WTHR Channel 13 Indianapolis reports.
Jul 11: Jackson (Achilles) has agreed to sign a three-year, $21 million contract with the Pacers, Shams Charania of ESPN reports.
Jul 7: Haliburton will miss the entire 2025-26 season while recovering from surgery on his right Achilles tendon, Shams Charania of ESPN reports.
Jul 7: Wiseman (Achilles) is expected to sign with the Pacers on Monday, Tony East of WTHR Channel 13 Indianapolis reports.
Jul 3: Walker (ankle) has been ruled out for Sunday's game against the Thunder.
Jul 15: Brown (ankle) is out for Monday's Summer League game against the Lakers, Law Murray of The Athletic reports.
Jul 15: Thiero (knee) signed a three-year, $5.95 million contracts with the Lakers on Sunday, Michael Scotto of USA Today reports.
Jul 13: Small didn't play in Friday's 92-78 Summer League loss to the Celtics due to a coach's decision.
Jul 4: Coward (shoulder) is doubtful to play in the 2025 Summer League, according to Damichael Cole of The Memphis Commercial Appeal.
Jul 3: Morant (hip) finished the 2024-25 campaign with averages of 23.2 points, 7.3 assists, 4.1 rebounds and 1.2 steals across 30.4 minutes per game in 50 regular-season appearances.
Jul 3: Jackson underwent successful surgery to repair a turf toe injury in his right foot, the Grizzlies announced Wednesday.
Jul 3: Edey underwent successful surgery Tuesday to re-stabilize his sprained left ankle and will be re-evaluated in four months, NBA reporter Marc Stein reports.
Jul 3: Clarke received an orthobiologic injection in his right knee Monday, but he will not require surgery and is expected to make a full recovery prior to the 2025-26 regular season.
Jul 14: Larsson logged 24 points (7-14 FG, 1-3 3Pt, 9-10 FT), six assists and two rebounds across 33 minutes in Monday's 100-96 Summer League win over the Celtics.
Jul 3: Rozier (ankle) has been ruled out for Monday's Game 4 against Cleveland.
Jul 17: Bouyea (rest/thigh) didn't play in Wednesday's 102-96 Summer League loss to Chicago.
Jul 17: Shannon (rest) is out for Wednesday's Summer League game against the Suns, Jon Krawczynski of The Athletic reports.
Jul 17: Queen (thumb) won't play during Wednesday's Summer League game against the Thunder, Will Guillory of The Athletic reports.
Jul 17: Peavy (rest) has been ruled out for Wednesday's game against the Thunder, Erin Summers of the Gulf Coast Sports & Entertainment Network reports.
Jul 10: Jones (shoulder) agreed to a three-year, $68 million contract extension with New Orleans on Thursday, Shams Charania of ESPN reports.
Jul 3: The Pelicans announced Monday that Williamson (back) won't play for the rest of the 2024-25 season.
Jul 3: Shams Charania of ESPNMurray suffered a torn right Achilles tendon during Friday's game against the Celtics and will now miss the rest of the season, Shams Charania of ESPN.com reports.
Jul 3: Murphy sustained a season-ending torn labrum in his right shoulder during Monday's 127-81 loss to the Pistons, Shams Charania of ESPN reports.
Jul 3: Missi (ankle) is out for Sunday's game against the Thunder.
Jul 3: Matkovic (hamstring) has been ruled out for Sunday's game against the Thunder.
Jul 3: Hawkins (back) is out for Sunday's game against the Thunder.
Jun 24: Bey (knee) was traded to the Wizards on Tuesday, ESPN's Shams Charania reports.
Jul 16: Hart (finger) underwent surgery and is expected to resume basketball activities later in the summer, Brett Siegel of ClutchPoints.com reports.
Jul 16: Dadiet (toe) has been ruled out for Tuesday's Summer League game against the Nets, Stefan Bondy of The New York Post reports.
Jul 16: McCullar (nose) has been ruled out for Tuesday's Summer League game against the Nets, Stefan Bondy of The New York Post reports.

Jul 16: Thunder general manager Sam Presti said in a June 29 press conference that Sorber won't play in the Salt Lake City and Las Vegas Summer Leagues while the rookie center recovers from February surgery on his left foot. "He is still in the return-to-performance phase, and the draft process doesn't really allow for great progress in that because he is traveling all over the place," Presti said of Sorber.
Jul 10: Williams (wrist) agreed to terms on a five-year, $287 million contract extension with the Thunder on Thursday, Shams Charania of ESPN reports.
Jul 17: Richardson (rest) won't play in Wednesday's Summer League game against Brooklyn, Jason Beede of the Orlando Sentinel reports.
Jul 3: The Magic announced Tuesday that Suggs (knee) has been ruled out for the remainder of the 2024-25 campaign after undergoing successful surgery.
Jul 17: Edgecombe (rest) has been ruled out for Wednesday's game against the Mavericks, Tony Jones of The Athletic reports.
Jul 17: Bona (rest) has been ruled out for Wednesday's Summer League game against the Mavericks, Tony Jones of The Athletic reports.
Jul 17: Edwards (rest) won't play in Wednesday's Summer League game against the Mavericks, Tony Jones of The Athletic reports.
Jul 16: Barlow (not injury related) will be shut down for the remainder of the Summer League, Adam Aaronson of PhillyVoice.com reports.
Jul 14: George (knee) underwent surgery Monday to treat an injury sustained during a recent workout, Shams Charania of ESPN reports.
Jul 14: Embiid (knee) has resumed partial basketball activities, per Tony Jones of The Athletic.
Jul 3: Oubre (knee) exercised his $8.38 million player option with the 76ers on Sunday, Shams Charania of ESPN reports.
Jul 3: McCain (knee) will not be part of the team's Summer League roster, Kyle Neubeck of AllPHLY.com reports.
Jul 3: Maxey (finger) is expected to miss the rest of the season, Shams Charania of ESPN reported Thursday.
Jul 3: Drummond (toe) exercised his $5 million player option for the 2025-26 season Friday, Michael Scotto of USA Today reports.
Jul 17: Brea (thumb) is out for Wednesday's Summer League game against the Timberwolves, Duane Rankin of The Arizona Republic reports.
Jul 3: Richards (elbow) is out for Sunday's game against the Kings.
Jul 3: Williams underwent an arthroscopic procedure Thursday to address inflammation in his left knee and will miss 4-6 weeks.
Jul 3: Sharpe (knee) has been ruled out for Sunday's game against the Lakers.
Jul 3: Henderson (concussion) is out for Sunday's game against the Lakers.
Jul 3: Grant (knee) is out for Sunday's game against the Lakers.
Jun 24: Avdija (thumb) has been ruled out for Sunday's game against the Lakers.
Jul 17: Jones won't play in Wednesday's Las Vegas Summer League game against the Cavaliers due to right oblique soreness, Brenden Nunes of KHTK Sactown Sports 1140 reports.
Jul 3: Monk Shams Charania of ESPN for a strained left calf injury in two weeks, Shams Charania reports.
Jul 16: Harper has been shut down for the remainder of the Las Vegas Summer League for rest purposes, Don Harris of News 4 San Antonio reports Wednesday.
Jul 8: The Wizards traded Olynyk (heel) to the Spurs for Malaki Branham, Blake Wesley and a 2026 second-round pick, Shams Charania of ESPN reports.
Jul 3: Vassell (ankle) is out for Sunday's game against the Raptors.
Jul 3: Sochan (back) is out for Sunday's game against the Raptors.
Jul 3: Fox will undergo season-ending surgery to repair tendon damage in his left pinkie finger Tuesday, Shams Charania of ESPN reports.
Jul 10: Ingram (ankle) was cleared for contact Thursday, Josh Lewenberg of TSN.ca reports.
Jul 3: Poeltl agreed to a four-year, $104 million contract extension with the Raptors on Tuesday, Shams Charania of ESPN reports.
